newsitem.title: USA: Union Planters, Leader merger OK'd.
newsitem.headline: Union Planters, Leader merger OK'd.

text.p: Union Planters Corp and Leader Financial Corp said Friday that shareholders of both companies have approved their merger.
Under the deal, which is expected to close in early October, Union Planters will acquire Leader Financial in a deal valued at about $523 million.
Investors of Leader Financial are to receive 1.525 shares of Union Planters common stock for each share of Leader stock. Any fractional shares are to be paid in cash.
